title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
review: Classic novel that explores racial injustice and moral growth through the eyes of a young girl.

author: George Orwell
review: Dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian regime and the struggle for freedom and truth.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
review: Coming-of-age novel narrated by a disenchanted teenager struggling with adolescence and society.

title: Where the Wild Things Are
author: Maurice Sendak
review: Children's picture book exploring imagination, emotions, and the wildness within.
